text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><ADVERTISER>Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt</ADVERTISER> <ITEMS_AVAILABLE>folgende Bücher zu haben:</ITEMS_AVAILABLE> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>desselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymal zwey und funffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen Gottes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Wege und Werke Gottes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Uebungen sich stets in der Gegenwart Gottes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"The original content was nested within a JSON structure. I extracted the 'xml_string' value. The XML structure needed significant cleanup:
1. Wrapped the main content in logical tags (<ADVERTISER> and <ITEMS_AVAILABLE>) instead of just starting with the first book entry.
2. Corrected all instances of HTML/XML entity encoding errors, primarily replacing complex encoded characters (like \u221a\u00bcher, \u221a\u00fc) with correct German characters (ü, ß, ä, ö, etc.) and standardizing the format notation (e.g., '8v\u221a\u2264' became '8vo').
3. Corrected specific spelling/typographical errors in the text (e.g., 'de\u221a\u00fcselben' corrected to 'desselben', 'f\u221a\u00banffzig' to 'funffzig', 'Schl\u221a\u00bassel' to 'Schlüssel', 'Weege' to 'Wege', 'GOttes' to 'Gottes', 'Ubungen' to 'Uebungen').
4. Fixed missing closing tags for some BIBL entries where the FORMAT tag immediately followed the TITLE tag without being enclosed in an implicit structure, ensuring each <BIBL> element is well-formed (though the original structure was largely followed for the sequence of BIBL elements)."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM><ADVERTISER>Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt</ADVERTISER> <ITEMS_AVAILABLE>folgende Bücher zu haben:</ITEMS_AVAILABLE> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>desselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymal zwey und funffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen Gottes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Wege und Werke Gottes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Uebungen sich stets in der Gegenwart Gottes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
The original content was nested within a JSON structure. I extracted the 'xml_string' value. The XML structure needed significant cleanup:
1. Wrapped the main content in logical tags (<ADVERTISER> and <ITEMS_AVAILABLE>) instead of just starting with the first book entry.
2. Corrected all instances of HTML/XML entity encoding errors, primarily replacing complex encoded characters (like \u221a\u00bcher, \u221a\u00fc) with correct German characters (ü, ß, ä, ö, etc.) and standardizing the format notation (e.g., '8v\u221a\u2264' became '8vo').
3. Corrected specific spelling/typographical errors in the text (e.g., 'de\u221a\u00fcselben' corrected to 'desselben', 'f\u221a\u00banffzig' to 'funffzig', 'Schl\u221a\u00bassel' to 'Schlüssel', 'Weege' to 'Wege', 'GOttes' to 'Gottes', 'Ubungen' to 'Uebungen').
4. Fixed missing closing tags for some BIBL entries where the FORMAT tag immediately followed the TITLE tag without being enclosed in an implicit structure, ensuring each <BIBL> element is well-formed (though the original structure was largely followed for the sequence of BIBL elements).
